Project Synopsis Submission
===========================

by [postgraduatepic](https://fke.utm.my/author/postgraduatepic/ "Posts by postgraduatepic")
 | Oct 5, 2017 | [Postgraduate-info](https://fke.utm.my/category/postgraduate-info/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/10/project-synopsis.png)

Dear Master Students (Taught Course);

Please be reminded to submit **Project Synopsis (RP1-1 or RP2-1 form)** to postgraduate office by **30th October 2017 (before 12.30 pm)**.  
The RP1-1 and RP2-1 forms can be downloaded [here](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/forms/)
.  
More details on the project schedules can be found [here](https://fke.utm.my/postgraduate-current-student/project-research-schedules/)
.
